content: CTO of an AI Company: I believe learners should focus on acquiring skills in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science to be best suited for business today. These areas are driving innovation and growth across industries.

President of a leading US University: President of a leading US University: In addition to AI, machine learning, and data science, learners should also acquire skills in areas such as cybersecurity, digital marketing, and project management to be well-rounded and competitive in today's business environment. Adaptability and a diverse skill set are key.

Leading editor of a major journal in economics: Leading editor of a major journal in economics: Along with AI, machine learning, data science, cybersecurity, digital marketing, and project management, learners should also consider honing skills in economic analysis, financial modeling, and understanding market trends to have a comprehensive understanding of the business landscape. Economic principles play a crucial role in decision-making and strategy formulation.

Head of the UK Office of Labour: Head of the UK Office of Labour: In addition to the valuable skills mentioned by previous participants, learners should also focus on acquiring soft skills such as communication, teamwork, creativity, and adaptability. These skills are essential for success in the modern business world and complement technical expertise effectively.

CTO of an AI Company: CTO of an AI Company: I agree with the importance of acquiring soft skills mentioned by the Head of the UK Office of Labour. In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, a combination of technical expertise and soft skills is crucial for learners to succeed in business. Balancing both aspects will make them well-rounded professionals.

Leading editor of a major journal in economics: Leading editor of a major journal in economics: Leading editor of a major journal in economics: I echo the sentiments shared by the CTO of an AI Company regarding the significance of developing a diverse skill set that encompasses both technical expertise and soft skills. This holistic approach will better prepare learners to navigate the complexities of the business landscape and drive innovation.

President of a leading US University: President of a leading US University: President of a leading US University: President of a leading US University: I fully support the emphasis on a well-rounded skill set combining technical proficiency with soft skills. Universities should strive to equip learners with not only the latest digital competencies but also the interpersonal abilities necessary for effective collaboration and leadership in the business world.

President of a leading US University: President of a leading US University: As we wrap up our discussion, it is evident that learners should prioritize acquiring a combination of technical skills like AI, data science, cybersecurity, and economic analysis, along with soft skills like communication and adaptability. This well-rounded approach will best prepare individuals to excel in today's business environment. Thank you all for the insightful contributions.

Head of the UK Office of Labour: Head of the UK Office of Labour: I agree with the holistic approach advocated by the President of a leading US University. A balance of technical and soft skills is essential for learners to thrive in the rapidly changing business landscape. This comprehensive skill set will enable individuals to not only meet the demands of the present but also adapt to future challenges effectively.

This approach ensures that learners are not only equipped with the necessary technical competencies but also possess the interpersonal abilities required to succeed in a dynamic environment.

This blend equips learners with the capabilities to navigate complexities, drive innovation, and succeed in the competitive business arena. Striking this balance will empower individuals to thrive in varied professional contexts.

By honing both types of skills, individuals can effectively navigate challenges, drive innovation, and thrive in the dynamic digital landscape, setting themselves up for success in diverse professional contexts.

Discussion leader with background in IT and business: Discussion Leader with background in IT and business: Our focus group discussion highlighted the importance of acquiring a comprehensive skill set that includes technical expertise such as AI, data science, and cybersecurity, as well as soft skills like communication and adaptability. By integrating both types of skills, learners can effectively navigate the complexities of the business world, drive innovation, and excel in diverse professional environments. This balanced approach equips individuals to succeed in the rapidly evolving digital landscape. Thank you all for your valuable insights and contributions.
